goals__remit: Nouryon is your partner in essential chemistry for a sustainable future. We are a global specialty chemicals leader. Nouryon is the new name for the former AkzoNobel Specialty Chemicals business, which was divested on October 1, 2018. Industries worldwide rely on our essential chemistry in the manufacture of everyday products such as paper, plastics, building materials, food, pharmaceuticals, and personal care items. Building on our nearly 400-year history, the dedication of our 10,000 employees, and our shared commitment to business growth, strong financial performance, safety, sustainability, and innovation, we have established a world-class business and built strong partnerships with our customers. We operate in over 80 countries around the world and our portfolio of industry-leading brands includes Eka, Dissolvine, Trigonox, and Berol.
